module_plan.title: The Stubbornness of Objects

module_plan.title: The Net Force Equation
module_plan.description: Introduction to the mathematical representation of the First Law: when the sum of forces (ΣF) equals zero, acceleration is zero. This formalizes the relationship between balanced forces and constant velocity.

We then transition to the physical property (mass) and the mathematical expression (net force) to provide analytical depth. Finally, a challenge in a zero-friction environment (space) verifies that the student can apply the concept beyond terrestrial observations.
